page.title: 07 LOCAL OFFICIALS
page.content: Mr.M Beaumont is the Seigneur, he is the grandson of the Dame of Sark. He lives at La Seigneurie with his wife. They have two sons, neither of whom live here. The Seneschal is the judge and chairs the Chief Pleas meetings,the Prevot <who is like a Bailiff> who reads the charges and decisions of the court, the Greffier who keeps the records in the Greffe office,one Constable and Deputy Constable who keep order on the island,one Treasurer who looks after the finances of the Island,12 douzaine members,12 deputies who speak for the people,and 40 tenants <own 1/40 of the land each and have one vote in the Chief Pleas>. The Constable only holds his job for two years after being both Deputy and Deputy Costable.The Vingtenier helps him.
